title: In-Context Learning of Polynomial Kernel Regression in Transformers with GLU Layers
details: H Sun, A Jadbabaie, N Azizan - arXiv preprint arXiv:2501.18187, 2025
abstract: Transformer-based models have demonstrated remarkable ability in in-context learning (ICL), where they can adapt to unseen tasks from a prompt with a few examples, without requiring parameter updates. Recent research has provided …
